params.taskDescription:
Blood type <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>

      <mo>+</mo>
    </mrow>
  </msup>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\text{AB}^{ + }</annotation></semantics></math> is the universal acceptor. Of the 140 people who donated at City Honors, how many had blood type <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <msup>
    <mtext>AB</mtext>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mo>+</mo>
    </mrow>
  </msup>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\text{AB}^{ + }</annotation></semantics></math>?

params.taskDescription:
Opal has blood type <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <msup>
    <mtext>A</mtext>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mo>+</mo>
    </mrow>
  </msup>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\text{A}^{ + }</annotation></semantics></math>. If she needs to have surgery that requires a blood transfusion, she can accept blood from anyone who does not have a type B blood factor. How many people donated blood during this drive at City Honors that Opal can accept?

params.taskDescription:
Find <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>n</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mi>A</mi>
  <mo>∩<!-- ∩ --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>R</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <mtext>h</mtext>
      </mrow>
      <mo>+</mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">n(A \cap {\text{R}}{{\text{h}}^ + })</annotation></semantics></math>.

  <mi>B</mi>
  <mo>∩<!-- ∩ --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>R</mtext>
  </mrow>
